user_input: Please create hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. No need to access any PLEXOS database for now
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

tasks.description: Generate hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios using the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' scenarios for the years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Please create hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050.' determine the appropriate parameters for generating hourly demand profiles.

tasks.description: Split the nodes of the generated demand profiles to allow for detailed node-level analyses.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request to split the nodes from the generated demand profiles.

tasks.description: Convert the hourly hydrogen demand profiles into the TST format required by the TYNDP study team.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request to convert the demand profiles to TST format.
